org.linqs.psl.reasoner.admm.term

Class ADMMObjectiveTerm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.linqs.psl.reasoner.admm.term.ADMMObjectiveTerm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReasonerTerm
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HyperplaneTerm, LinearLossTerm, SquaredHyperplaneTerm

    public abstract class ADMMObjectiveTerm
extends Object
implements ReasonerTerm
    A term in the objective to be optimized by an ADMMReasoner.

      abstract void minimize(float stepSize, float[] consensusValues)
      Updates x to the solution of
      argmin f(x) + stepSize / 2 * \|x - z + y / stepSize \|_2^2
      for the objective term f(x)

      Get the number of variables in this term.

      • getVariables

        public LocalVariable[] getVariables()
        Get the variables used in this term. The caller should not modify the returned array, and should check size() for a reliable length.
